com.amalgam.view

类 ViewUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amalgam.view.ViewUtils

  • public final class ViewUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    dp,pixel,sp相互转换 Utility for the View.

    • 方法详细资料

      • dipToPixel

        public static int dipToPixel(android.content.Context context,
                             int dip)
        Convert the dips to pixels, based on density scale.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        dip - to be converted value.
        返回:
        converted value(px).

      • dipToPixel

        public static int dipToPixel(android.content.res.Resources resources,
                             int dip)
        Convert the dips to pixels, based on density scale.
        参数:
        resources - application resources.
        dip - to be converted value.
        返回:
        converted value(px).

      • pixelToDip

        public static float pixelToDip(android.content.Context context,
                               int pixel)
        Convert the pixels to dips, based on density scale.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        pixel - to be converted value.
        返回:
        converted value(dip)

      • pixelToDip

        public static float pixelToDip(android.view.WindowManager windowManager,
                               int pixel)
        Convert the pixels to dips, based on density scale
        参数:
        windowManager - the window manager of the display to use the scale density of.
        pixel - to be converted value.
        返回:
        converted value(dip).

      • sipToPixel

        public static float sipToPixel(android.content.Context context,
                               float sip)
        Convert the sip to pixels, based on density scale.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        sip - to be converted value.
        返回:
        converted value(px)

      • sipToPixel

        public static float sipToPixel(android.content.res.Resources resources,
                               float sip)
        Convert the sip to pixels, based on density scale.
        参数:
        resources - application resources.
        sip - to be converted value.
        返回:
        converted value(px)

      • pixelToSip

        public static float pixelToSip(android.content.Context context,
                               float pixels)
        Convert the pixels to sips, based on density scale.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        pixels - to be converted value.
        返回:
        converted value(sip)

      • toggleVisibility

        public static void toggleVisibility(android.view.View view,
                                    int hidingPolicy)
        改变视图可见性 Toggle visibility of a View. Status of invisible is applied by the parameter of hidingPolicy.
        参数:
        view - to toggle
        hidingPolicy - View.INVISIBLE or View.GONE

      • findViewById

        public static <V extends android.view.View> V findViewById(android.view.View view,
                                                           int id)
        Find the specific view from the view as traversal root. Returning value type is bound to your variable type.
        类型参数:
        V - the view class type parameter.
        参数:
        view - the root view to find the view.
        id - the view id.
        返回:
        the view, null if not found.
